titles.title: Jesus Shall Take The Highest Honor

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus shall take the highest honor, Jesus shall take the highest place. Let all earth join hands in exalting The Name that is above all other names.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let’s bow the knee in humble adoration, For at His name every knee shall bow. Every tongue confess He is Christ, God’s only Son. Sovereign Lord, we give You glory now.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For all honor and blessing and power Belong to You, belong to You. All honor and blessing and power Belong to You, belong to You, Lord Jesus Christ, Son of the Living God.{/lang-eng}
